releaseNotes: Feature update: Storage location tracking, Cloud status indicators, OneDrive support, and Restore timeout fix.
changelog: Feature: Storage Location Tracking (Local, Google Drive, OneDrive, S3)
Feature: Cloud Connection Status on Dashboard
Feature: OneDrive OAuth2 Support with Auth Code Exchange
Fix: Increased server timeout to 10 minutes (fixes 502 errors during restore)
UI: Storage column in Backups table with icons
UI: Cloud provider status indicators on Dashboard
